Function.Name: Choose
Function.Description: Choose returns a value from the list of choices based on the value of index.
Function.ReturnDescription: A value from the given list of choices.
Function.ArgumentDescription: The index is a number that specifies the index of the choice. It should be between 1 and the number of available choices. If it is out of bounds, Choose returns null.

Function.Name: Switch
Function.Description: The Switch evaluates the expressions from left to right, and returns the value associated with the first expression to evaluate to True. If all of the expressions are False, then Switch returns null.
Function.ReturnDescription: One of the values in the value list value1, value2, and so on.
Function.ArgumentDescription: Condition1, condition2, and so on are Boolean expressions. value1, value2, and so on are the possible values that may be returned.

Function.Name: IIF
Function.Description: Returns one of two parts, depending on the evaluation of the expression.
Function.ReturnDescription: truePart if an expression is True and falsePart if an expression is False.
Function.ArgumentDescription: A value is returned if an expression is True.
A value is returned if an expression is False.
